content: *a lovely cabled hat for the whole family here s our christmas gift to thank you for choosing our yarns year after year and to help you prepare for happy thoughtful holidays the cabled patterns on this hat require a little experience and a certain amount of attention but it s a spectacular little project that can easily be done in a few evenings it is knitted in a seamless round from the bottom to the top starting with a wide single ribbed edge designed to be folded in half once the brim is complete the body of the hat and the crown decreases are all charted one chart for each size so you can easily follow your progress by ticking off each completed round explanations are available on our blog * ---------------------------------------- ---------------------------------------- **sizes ** child adult s/m adult m/l to fit head circumference up to 40 to 46 46 to 54 53 to 59 cm / 15 75 to 18 25 18 25 to 22 20 75 to 23 25 inches with 2 to 8 cm / 0 75 to 3 25 inches of negative ease see finished measurements below **yarn & yardage ** * single yarn version gilliatt approx 45 60 80 g or 1 ball of **de rerum natura gilliatt** arles merino and black portuguese merino woolen spun 250 m / 100 g or approx 115 150 200 m / 126 165 218 yards of similar worsted weight yarn *the child s size sample has been knitted in gilliatt poivre blanc the adult m/l size sample has been knitted in gilliatt aubépine * * version with two yarns held together ulysse + bérénice approx 31 40 55 g or 1 1 2 ball s of **de rerum natura ulysse** arles merino and black portuguese merino woolen spun 185 m / 50 g or 115 150 200 m / 126 165 218 yards of similar sport weight yarn and approx 14 18 24 g or 1 ball of **de rerum natura bérénice** 55% super kid mohair 25% silk 20% organic arles merino 210 m / 25 g or approx 115 145 195 m / 126 159 213 yards of similar lace weight yarn *the adult s/m size sample has been knitted in ulysse «granit» held together with bérénice «crépuscule» * **gauge ** 22 sts x 26 row = 10 x 10 cm / 4 inches knitted in ribbed cables with larger needles 4 5 mm / us 7 measured after blocking **needles ** 4 5 mm / us 7 circular needles with a cable length of 40 cm / 16 for main part 4 mm / us 6 circular needles or one size smaller than main needles with a cable length of 40 cm / 16 for brim ///// *un joli bonnet torsadé à offrir à toute la famille voici notre cadeau de noël pour vous remercier de choisir nos fils année après année et pour vous aider à préparer des fêtes joyeuses et attentionnées les motifs
